ygData.subject: Re: Tanks vs Spellcasters
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah I think that if I play a third character, it will be a druid. it s quite nice to have several characters actually. When you re a level 20 enchanter, you
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah I think that if I play a third character, it will be a druid. it's
quite nice to have several characters actually. When you're a level 20
enchanter, you cant solo much anymore and if there is nobody online, you
just sit there looking for people to play with. Well now, when that happens
I'll just switch to my other characters. I havent played my level 16 necro
at all for a long time. Necros are powerful but boring. They cant party
really well ( except parties of necros that really really kick ass ) and I
hate soloing.
Skara de Toxxulia <Elite>

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Borelli [mailto:timb@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 11:47 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Tanks vs Spellcasters


From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>

when i made my druid, i fell in love with her (she's a wood elf, so how can
ya not? heh j/k). i got to level 6 in 6 hours, and got her to level 12 in
48 hours of playing time. i havent played her much since i got to 20 with
my enchanter, but it's a great combo of tank, healer and caster class. fun!

Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 20th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule

At 10:59 AM 6/3/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>I've read in a lot of places that spellcasters had a hard time at the start
>( up to level 5 lets say ).
